main.title: 1st Place
contents: Amazon Echo Show 8 for each team member

main.title: 2nd Place
contents: Lenovo Smart Clock 2 for each team member

main.title: 3rd Place
contents: JBL Link Bluetooth Speaker for each team member

category.title: Best Design
category.description: Awarded to the most usable and best looking user interface.
contents: Adobe Creative Cloud Subscription for each team member

category.title: Most Creative Idea
category.description: The project that has the most original idea or reinvention.
contents: Wacom One tablet for each team member

category.title: Local Impact Prize
category.description: The best idea that addresses an issue in your local community.
contents: Frank Green Tap-to-Pay Reusable Cup for each team member

category.title: First Timers Prize
category.description: The best project created by first-time hackathon participants.
category.subtext: To be eligible, at least 50% of your team must have not attended a hackathon.
contents: Logitech G213 Mechanical Keyboard for each team member

category.title: Most Entertaining Pitch
category.description: Can you summarise your pitch in in three minutes - whilst also being engaging and entertaining?
contents: Amazon Echo Dot for each team member

category.title: People's Choice Award
category.description: The project that wins the hearts and votes of the people.
contents: Morphie Charge Stream Powerstation for each team member

category.title: Best Social Media Prize
category.description: Send out the best tweet, message, photo, story or short video that sums up your experience of #UNIHACK2022.

category.title: Best Meme
category.description: Make the best meme during the event and post it on the UNIHACK Discord. I couldn't make it any more obvious.

sponsor.title: Global Social Impact Prize
sponsor.description: The best idea that addresses one of the UN Sustainable Development Goals or antoehr global issue in our society today

sponsor.title: The Customer Experience Award
sponsor.description: Awarded to the team who delivers the project that has the best customer experience for its users
contents: $300 Coles Myer Gift Card for each team member

sponsor.title: Engineering Excellence Prize
sponsor.description: Engineers, we want to see you innovate in solving problems and demonstrate passion in the ways you can create and deliver your solution
contents: A pair of Apple AirPod Pros for each team member
A session with Macquarie engineers with tech experience relevant to your team
